title.narrative: Support to the organization of the ASEM Conference on Promoting economic and social inclusion in Asia and Europe

description.narrative: Objectives: • To support to the organization of the ASEM Conference on Promoting economic and social inclusion in Asia and Europe, thereby contributing to maximizing progress towards greater economic growth and welfare improvements while leaving no one behind in ASEM member countries, and facilitating the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals. • To share the Danish values and principles in the field of economic and social inclusion. • To strengthen the platform for exchanging policy and best practices between Vietnam, Denmark and the rest of the ASEM-partners within the ASEM framework, to support the process of improving the ability, opportunity and dignity of individuals, especially the disadvantaged, to take part in society and the economy.

mailing-address.narrative: Embassy of Denmark, 7th Floor, BIDV Tower, 194 Tran Quang Khai Street
